Navigate
1014 W Lancaster Ave, Bryn Mawr, PA 19010
For a wheelchair accessible entrance as well as free parking, turn from Lancaster Ave onto Thomas Ave. Look for Relax the Back which is at the corner of Lancaster and Thomas. Tennis Junction will then be on your left.
